general_advisory: Harvest the matured paddy. If 80% of the panicles are matured, harvest and reduce the moisture by sun drying. Control rodent problems, powdery mildew, weed management, red rot disease, downy mildew, diamond back moth, and maintain proper water depth for fisheries.

advisory: Paddy is at soft dough-physiological maturity stage. Harvest the crop and store in a safe place after sun drying.
Sowing is ongoing, ensure seed treatment before sowing.
Seed treatment is mandatory before sowing.
Control leaf eating caterpillar and fruit borer in winter vegetables by applying specific pesticides.
